altername_name: Nickelodeon The Naked Brothers Band: The Video Game
name: The Naked Brothers Band: The Video Game
overview: Become a part of the Naked Brothers Band Tour! Use your Wii remote and nunchuk or microphone to sing along and play up to 5 instruments as each member of the band. Includes 25 of your favorite Naked Brothers Band songs. Play to unlock new songs, concert venues, outfits, instruments and more!
